phrases: Do not touch those dice, Josuke Higashikata!
What is he going to do?
If Rohan finds out that I have been using that alien to cheat...
just apologizing is definitely not going to cut it.
I could be imagining it, but I feel like the dice are staring at me.
I will go easy and just bet two.
You get it now, right, Alien?
I need to just manage to win.
I just need to be a tiny bit ahead in the end.
I guess what happens twice is bound to happen a third time.
I suppose it is possible to roll this more than once.
An omen is worth five times the bet, yes?
That is what came up, so it cannot be helped.
I guess things that happen twice can happen a third time.
What the hell are you doing?!
I am not sure how, but I know that you are cheating.
It is unforgivable that I cannot figure it out!
Dude, you are messed up in the head!
Up until now, I have held back my anger toward you
for Mr. Joestar and Koichi's sakes,
but you are currently trying to make a fool of me.
Just thinking about you laughing deep down inside is unbearable.
I will have Shining Diamond fix it.
Do you know why I did that to my pinky?
So that you will not be able to forfeit the game, Josuke Higashikata!
I will not let a doofus like you underestimate the great Rohan!
We will both just play one more time.
In that time, I swear I will figure out how you are cheating.
If I am unable to determine how you are cheating...
There is two million yen there.
I will use that to ask you to fix my pinky with Shining Diamond.
However, if I figure out how you are cheating,
I am going to take your pinky, Josuke Higashikata.
Hey, you two look like you are having fun.
I was stuck in the hospital for a month.
I do not really remember how,
but apparently I hurt my head on the side of the road.
What the hell are you doing here?
I called him earlier and asked him to act as an official.
I will make sure the contracted promise is promptly and surely collected,
using this lock that attaches to your heart.
I will work fairly, no matter who wins or who is involved.
I charge 20, or 400,000 yen, whichever sum is larger.
You will both play one more time
and see if you can figure out the cheat or not, correct?
However, you can also get out of this by not cheating,
so I will ensure that does not happen.
I will create a rule where Tamami's lock will automatically attack you.
But I have to do this!
I have to keep the cheat going to the end and break through this!
Well, then... I will go first.
A pair of three's and a four!
That throw ended up being normal naturally.
Now he will not find out.
I-It is my turn next, right?
It is as though something you asked someone to do went well.
Rohan has not figured it out.
I am just going to keep playing!
It is because Rohan shook him around so much.
Do not you dare hide the dice with your hand.
You need to throw the dice so I can see them.
I wonder if there is a fire somewhere.
He is going to turn back!
Show me what is in your hand at once!
Sorry so sudden, but that was a yell to get me hyped up!
Did you figure it out, Rohan-sensei?
Or are you admitting defeat, Rohan-sensei?
Looks like the rash is not showing up on Rohan's side.
Did you figure it out or not?
Rohan-sensei, your house is on fire!
The magnifying glass caused the fire!
We were too busy with the game to even notice!
I do not care if my house is burning!
It is more important that I figure out how Josuke is cheating!
You have to get out of here, and take your two million!
W-Well, I will be going now...
But first, I am going to fix your pinky.
No one asked you to do that!
But I guess I have a way of making people resent me, huh?
Rohan Kishibe's House: 7,000,000 yen in fire damage
Josuke: Did not really lose anything,. but managed to make Rohan's grudge.
Rohan Kishibe's house: 7,000,000 yen in fire damage.
Josuke: Did not really lose anything,
but managed to make Rohan's grudge toward him even deeper.
Now, all you drivers out there, please be careful when driving.
It seems a motorcycle crashed at the entrance of Futatsumori Tunnel yesterday,
and the young rider was badly injured.
She is been dressing up, she got new lipstick,
and she is in a good mood...
It is been a while since Mom got naked in front of Dad.
Am I a child that was born to parents who loved each other?
It is their fault I am in this mess.
Where did you sleep and eat after what happened yesterday?
You need to stay right behind me!
We just moved here, so there is a lot we must do.
Do not tell me you are pulling jokes on people again
by telling them you are an alien.
If he said that to you, please do not think anything of it.
At his last school in Tokyo, people took it seriously,
and there was a lot of trouble.
Now, if you will excuse us.
I brainwashed her into thinking that I am her son.
The name Mikitaka Hazekura is the name I am using on Earth.
Or was he a Stand user created by this arrow when it hurt him?
The way he pulled Josuke and Rohan Kishibe apart was very effective...
Next time, the next Stand, Highway Go Go,
will defeat those who go after my son!
Why are you avoiding eye contact with me?
You should at least greet me.
After all, I am older than you, Josuke Higashikata.
Th-That fire must have been a lot of trouble.
Just like in the movie Pretty Woman,
about 2,500,000 yen worth of furniture was burned.
Not that I care in the least.
Someday, I will pay you back for yesterday's dice game.
There was a door to a house in the tunnel wall.
There is a room in the tunnel wall.
A room that someone lives in!
But I cannot see either of their faces!
Shut the hell up, Rohan Kishibe!
How long are you going to try to mess with me?!
Can no one else see it?
Is that house... a new Stand user?
The man who cut off that woman's hand...
Completed in year 5 of the Kaei Period (1852).
Fixed in year 28 of the Showa Period.
Is on the road connecting S City and Morioh.
Because it is curved inside, the exit is not visible from the entrance.
As there is very little light, there are many accidents, and since is it rather creepy, it is considered haunted by young people.
There was a room inside the tunnel?!
You want to get back at me by telling me a stupid lie like that?
You do not believe me, Josuke Higashikata?
A liar like you who cheats with dice...
A liar like you who always does something different from what he says,
has the nerve to call me a liar?
It appears we truly do not get along.
I guess you would not understand, even if you went back there with me.
There was nothing here but a wall.
Maybe it really was an illusion.
Th-The room I saw from the bus.
Though the man and woman I saw earlier are not here.
So this room was a trap after all!
I cannot see it, but something is coming at me!
I could not see it, but it came right toward me.
The man that resembled Kira was also an illusion.
Now I know that room is a Stand.
Should I tell Mr. Joestar about it?
These things that look like footprints...
Apparently if I go faster than 60km/h, it cannot keep up.
I only slowed down a little bit!
I will turn it into a book and control it!
It is sucking out my power...
I know I just said that I never wanted to see Rohan again,
I am a liar who always does something different from what he says.
The Stand's name is Highway Go Go.
When a curious passer-by enters that room,
it will go any distance to chase them down,
like a hunting dog on a scent, then it sucks out their nutrients.
Once one is touched by Highway Go Go, its weak spot...
I do not have any strength.
I-I am losing more and more power...
I cannot even write an order on him...
I cannot believe you came back...
What the hell is that room?
I have left just a bit of your nutrients in you.
If you ask him for help, I will spare your life.
Because I will take his nutrients instead.
Help me lure him into this room.
What the hell is this room?
It almost looks as if someone lives in it!
He is suspicious, so he will not come any closer.
It is not like you two love each other, is it?
I told you to ask him for help.
I-If I lure him in here...
If I offer him up instead,
It will be a give-and-take in exchange for his nutrients.
One of my absolute favorite things to do
is to tell someone who I think is strong, no.
If you come into this room, you have no chance!
Do you really think I would run away
because someone told me to run away?
How can you do this, Josuke Higashikata?
I even told you of the danger...
You always do the opposite of what I think you will do.
And that is why I hate you.
That is why you piss me off!
You are going to be attacked!
Now he is got your scent!
Your body will fly backwards at 70km/h!
Josuke, Highway Go Go will follow you anywhere at 60km/h!
The only way for you to survive is to defeat the user!
To think that you would actually save me...
It is unbelievable, but I am moved!
I just have to find that thing's user, right?
I just need to find the user and kick his ass!
